meta_layout_title: Skloresurs – your reliable partner in the world of glass.
meta_home_description: Skloresurs - modern glass processing production according to European standards.
meta_catalog_description: Open our catalog to explore the range of products for creating unique design solutions.
meta_news_description: Join us and stay up to date with the latest articles and news in the glass processing industry. Interesting and relevant materials, the latest technological achievements, and much more.
meta_projects_description: We invite you to view our project gallery and find inspiration in the world of glass processing. Learn more about our projects and innovations that inspire industry professionals.
meta_services_description: Get financial and audit reports for a deeper understanding of our company. Trust reliable information about our financial stability and operations.
meta_seminars_description: Learn more about our seminars. Gain valuable knowledge and insights in the field of glass processing and discover new trends and skills in our industry.
meta_vacancies_description: Learn about our current vacancies and discover the opportunity to join our team.
meta_delivery_description: Delivery that meets your needs. Safe loading and unloading of glass units of any size and weight. Learn more about our delivery terms.
meta_reports_description: Get financial and audit reports for a deeper understanding of our company. Trust reliable information about our financial stability and operations.
navbar_components_description: Selection of components for glass processing
navbar_contact_us_description: Contact us via the feedback form
home_hero_description: Modern glass processing production in accordance with European standards
home_hero_details: The company "Skloresurs" has 19 years of experience in the field of architectural and interior glazing.
home_hero_mission_description: Modern glass processing technologies to realize your dreams. Look at the world with pleasure!
home_target_products: More than 50,000 m² of products per month
home_target_types: Over 60 types of glass in stock
home_certificates: The quality of our company's products is verified by the German institute IFT Rosenheim
home_quality_guide_description: The Guide defines the tolerances and deviations of the main parameters of our products. The guide is based on the standards listed here and the capabilities of modern equipment.
home_projects_description: Over the years of experience in glass processing, we have successfully implemented a number of impressive projects in collaboration with reliable partners. Learn more about our sites that not only transform the face of modern glazing but also help preserve the environment
home_contact_us_button_success: Your message has been successfully sent
home_contact_us_button_error: Message sending error. Please try again later.
delivery_p1: We understand the importance of timely and safe delivery, so our transport department is equipped with modern vehicles with manipulators. This allows safe loading and unloading of glass units of various sizes and weights, even in places with limited access.
delivery_p2: The glass units are securely packed to protect against damage during transportation and firmly fixed on the vehicle, minimizing risks.
delivery_p3: Our drivers have extensive experience on routes of varying complexity, which helps reduce delivery time and ensures high-quality transportation of products.
